name: Fungus and Delicacies
description:
Going into the woods to scavenge for supplies, you soon find yourself lost in a world that is not quite your own...

Fungus and Delicacies is an RPG Maker MV game. It is a 10-15 minute experience with 3 endings!

You can find more of my work HERE and if you want to support what I do check out my patreon!

Thank you, please enjoy! ♡♡♡

Credits

Art+Story: ZeddyBear

Controls

-For full screen hit alt+enter

-Arrow keys to move and enter to select and interact
